keyPrinciples.principle1: Less is more - sophistication through subtlety
keyPrinciples.principle3: Performance is a feature - smooth 60fps always
keyPrinciples.principle4: Maintain enchanting surf house soul - don't over-corporate
keyPrinciples.principle5: Every interaction should feel intentional and rewarding

inspirationSources: Luxury hotel websites (Four Seasons, Aman Resorts)
Premium travel apps (Airbnb, Luxury travel experiences)

notes.criticalSuccess: Do NOT over-animate. Each animation must serve UX purpose. Premium = restraint + quality, not quantity.
notes.surfHouseVibe: Keep it warm, welcoming, fun. Add sophistication without losing personality. Think 5-star resort, not corporate.
notes.beforeStarting: Audit current site for performance. Optimize images, reduce bloat. A million dollar site must load like one.
notes.recommendation: Start with hero and nav - these create 70% of premium perception
